comments:
eclipse 3.1 - when opening .class file with jad plugin an error appears
(attached image): "An error has occurred when activation this view", and after
pressing the OK button, the .class file is opened correctly as a decompiled file.
the following log was added to the eclipse .log file:

Created an attachment (id=24415)
image of the error msg

The Jad plug-in was referring to an internal JDT class that was likely removed in 3.1.  This bug should be 
reported against the developer of the Jad plug-in.  Referring to internal classes is a dangerous business 
because we don't guarantee their existence from release to release.
